alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Custer; Garfield; Loup (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 5:55AM CDT until July 16 at 6:15AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 AM CDT FOR SOUTHERN LOUP...SOUTHWESTERN GARFIELD...NORTHEASTERN CUSTER AND SOUTHEASTERN BLAINE COUNTIES... At 554 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 14 miles northeast of Anselmo to 8 miles east of Victoria Springs State Recreation Area to near Merna, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Broken Bow, Burwell, Taylor, Sargent, Merna, Comstock, Victoria Springs State Recreation Area, Calamus Reservoir State Recreation Area, Weissert, Lillian, Milburn, Milburn Diversion Dam State Wildlife Management Area, Round Valley, Walworth, Virginia Smith Dam, Wescott, Kent Diversion Dam State Wildlife Management Area, Homestead Knolls Campground, Horseshoe Bend Lake and Almeria. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 103 and 135. Highway 2 between mile markers 260 and 276. Highway 92 between mile markers 272 and 273. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
